ygData.subject: Re: Regular EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Well As an old player thinking of returning to eq.  My friend who returned awail ago, we was a team.  Has a 32 beasrlord, told me alot are gone the guilds have
ygData.messageBody:
Well As an old player thinking of returning to eq. My friend who
returned awail ago, we was a team. Has a 32 beasrlord, told me alot
are gone the guilds have takin a major hit etc. but I did and do
enjoy the game. As well, Id like to play again. AS I have sent him
emails to discuss the class to play looking toward either monk or
shammy...


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, bad_elf@c... wrote:
> Hubby and I won't even touch EQ2, although a lot of friends from
EQ have gone over. It's sad - I actually was fond of them then,
poof! gone without a trace.
>
> Laureth, 67 Lvl Cleric
> Fire and Fury
> Firona Vie
